View Report.alternate_names: View MD; View FORM; View DICT; View LIST; View HTML
View Report.description: This can be used to produce a report using any output format set.

Search String.description: An optional search string to filter results by.

Output Format.description: Optional specification of output format for the query.

Report Spec.description: Optional specification of an report  that defines the attributes/columns that will be returned.

Starts With.description: If true, look for matches with the search string starting from the beginning of  a field.

Ends With.description: If true, look for matches with the search string starting from the end of  a field.

Ignore Case.description: If true, ignore the difference between upper and lower characters when matching the search string.

Limit Result by Status.description: One of the status values from a list of valid values.

Metadata Element Subtype Names.description: Filter results by the list of metadata elements. If none are provided, then no status filtering will be performed.

Metadata Element Type Name.description: Optionally filter results by the type of metadata element.

Skip Relationshjps.description: Allow listed relationships to be skipped in the output returned.

Include Only Relationships.description: Include information only about specified relationships.

Skip Classified Elements.description: Skip elements with the any of the specified classifications.

Include Only Classified Elements.description: Include only elements with the specified classifications.

Governance Zone Filter.description: Include only elements in one of the specified governance zones.

Graph Query Depth.description: The depth of the hierarchy to return. Default is 5. Specifying 0 returns only the top level attributes.

AsOfTime.description: An ISO-8601 string representing the time to view the state of the repository.

Sort Order.valid_values: ANY; CREATION_DATE_RECENT; CREATION_DATA_OLDEST; LAST_UPDATE_RECENT; LAST_UPDATE_OLDEST; PROPERTY_ASCENDING; PROPERTY_DESCENDING
Sort Order.description: How to order the results. The sort order can be selected from a list of valid value.

Order Property Name.description: The property to use for sorting if the sort_order_property is PROPERTY_ASCENDING or PROPERTY_DESCENDING

Page Size.description: The number of elements returned per page.

Start From.description: When paging through results, the starting point of the results to return.
